name: Rosebeast
description:
Deep in the heart of the woods, a beast is born. Feed on all that surrounds your rose, and protect it from enemies which seek to strike at your heart.

- - -

In this arcade game, you control the Beast. Bump into objects to attack or eat them, and evolve into more powerful forms with the more you consume.

Be careful though, the forest is alive! Every ten seconds, enemies will move, attack, and spawn. Enemy attacks and movements are telegraphed, but be careful! They may change as other factors modify the map.

Allow the rose to bloom further, and your territory will widen, bringing on new challenges and bigger threats.

The BeastControlled with keyboard or controller, the beast can move without regard to the timer. 

Made in 48 hours for the Ludumdare Compo
